info.title: Notifuse API
info.description: API for Notifuse - a transactional email and newsletter management platform

post.description:
Sends a transactional notification to a contact through specified channels.
Requires authentication.

message_id.description: Unique identifier for the sent message

success.description: Whether the notification was sent successfully

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing authentication token

post.description: Creates a new contact or updates an existing one based on email address. Returns information about whether the contact was created or updated.

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing authentication token

get.summary: Get a contact by email address
get.description: Retrieves a contact by their email address within a specific workspace. The response always includes the contact's list subscriptions with their status (active, pending, unsubscribed, bounced, complained).

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address of the contact

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing authentication token

get.summary: Get a contact by external ID
get.description: Retrieves a contact by their external ID within a specific workspace. The response always includes the contact's list subscriptions with their status (active, pending, unsubscribed, bounced, complained).

parameters.name: external_id
parameters.description: The external ID of the contact

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing authentication token

post.description: Creates or updates multiple contacts in a single batch operation. This is significantly more efficient than individual upsert operations. Optionally subscribes all contacts to specified lists.

200.description: Batch import completed (may include partial failures)

value.error: write access to lists required when subscribe_to_lists is provided

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing authentication token

post.description: Deletes a contact from the workspace by email address. This action is permanent and cannot be undone.

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing authentication token

post.description: Updates the subscription status of a contact in a specific list. Can set status to active, pending, unsubscribed, bounced, or complained.

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing authentication token

get.description: Retrieves a list of broadcasts with pagination and optional filtering by status. Supports fetching template details for each variation.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of broadcasts to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of broadcasts to skip for pagination

parameters.name: with_templates
parameters.description: Include full template details for each variation

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing authentication token

get.description: Retrieves a single broadcast by ID. Optionally includes template details for each variation.

parameters.name: with_templates
parameters.description: Include full template details for each variation

post.description: Subscribe a contact to one or more email lists. This is a public endpoint that doesn't require authentication. If the list has double opt-in enabled, a confirmation email will be sent.

id.description: ID of the notification to send

channels.description: Specific channels to send through (if empty, use all configured channels)

data.description: Data to populate the template with

attachments.description: Email attachments (max 20 files, 3MB per file, 10MB total)

updated_at.description: When the contact was last updated

contact_lists.description: Lists the contact is subscribed to (only included in GET endpoints)

created_at.description: When the contact was subscribed to this list

updated_at.description: When the subscription was last updated

deleted_at.description: When the subscription was deleted (null if active)

list_ids.description: Array of list IDs to subscribe the contact to

email_hmac.description: HMAC of the email for authenticated subscription (optional)

action.description: The action that was performed on the contact

error.description: Error message if the operation failed

email.description: Email address of the contact to delete

contacts.description: Array of contacts to import (create or update)

subscribe_to_lists.description: Optional array of list IDs to subscribe all contacts to

operations.description: Array of operation results, one for each contact in the request

error.description: Global error message if the entire operation failed

action.description: The action that was performed: 'create' for new contacts, 'update' for existing contacts, 'error' for failed operations

error.description: Error message if this specific contact operation failed

found.description: Whether the contact was found in the list

filename.description: Name of the file (max 255 characters, no path separators)

content_type.description: MIME type of the file (auto-detected if not provided)

disposition.description: How the attachment should be displayed (defaults to 'attachment')

winning_template.description: ID of the winning template variation

test_sent_at.description: When the A/B test was sent

winner_sent_at.description: When the winning variation was sent

test_phase_recipient_count.description: Number of recipients in test phase

winner_phase_recipient_count.description: Number of recipients in winner phase

updated_at.description: When the broadcast was last updated

sample_percentage.description: Percentage of audience to use for testing

auto_send_winner.description: Automatically send winning variation to remaining audience

auto_send_winner_metric.description: Metric used to determine the winner

test_duration_hours.description: Duration of the test in hours (max 7 days)

segments.description: Optional segment IDs to filter recipients

use_recipient_timezone.description: Send at scheduled time in each recipient's timezone

id.description: ID of the broadcast to update
ID of the broadcast to schedule

scheduled_date.description: Scheduled date in YYYY-MM-DD format (required if send_now=false)

scheduled_time.description: Scheduled time in HH:MM format (required if send_now=false)

use_recipient_timezone.description: Send at scheduled time in each recipient's timezone

id.description: ID of the broadcast to pause
ID of the broadcast to resume
ID of the broadcast to cancel
ID of the broadcast to delete

recipient_email.description: Email address to send test to

template_id.description: Optional specific template variation to send
Template ID of the winning variation

total_count.description: Total number of broadcasts matching the query

variation_results.description: Results for each variation, keyed by template_id

recommended_winner.description: Recommended winning template ID based on metrics

is_auto_send_winner.description: Whether winner will be automatically sent

id.description: Unique identifier for the template (alphanumeric, underscores, and hyphens only)

template_macro_id.description: ID of the template macro (layout) to use

integration_id.description: ID of the integration managing this template (e.g., Supabase)

updated_at.description: When the template was last updated

deleted_at.description: When the template was deleted (null if active)

sender_id.description: ID of the sender configuration to use

subject_preview.description: Preview text shown in email clients

compiled_preview.description: Compiled HTML preview of the email

content.description: Tiptap JSON content (source of truth for web templates)

id.description: Unique identifier for the template (alphanumeric, underscores, and hyphens only)

template_macro_id.description: ID of the template macro (layout) to use

id.description: ID of the template to update

template_macro_id.description: ID of the template macro (layout) to use

id.description: ID of the template to delete

template_data.description: Data to use for Liquid templating

event_name.description: Event type name (lowercase letters, numbers, underscores, dots, and slashes only)

external_id.description: External system identifier for this event

properties.description: JSONB event data with arbitrary structure

integration_id.description: Optional reference to integration that created the event

created_at.description: When the event was created in the system

updated_at.description: When the event was last updated

events.description: Array of custom events to import (1-50 events)

event_ids.description: External IDs of successfully imported events
